hero.subtitle: Software Engineer
hero.description: I architect and build high-performance, scalable web applications using cutting-edge technologies and robust system design principles.

about.heading: About Me
about.description: I am an experienced Software Engineer with a proven track record in developing robust backend systems and website features for major clients. Known for rapid learning abilities and exceptional teamwork, I excel in fast-paced environments, delivering high-quality software solutions.

item1.title: Mid-Level Full Stack Developer
item1.p1: Developed and maintained the IPM Suite application, enhancing core features using <1>{{stack}}</1>, with extensive work on <1>{{database}}</1>.
item1.p2: Led the migration of legacy modules to a <1>{{architecture}}</1> with <1>{{frontend}}</1>, improving system scalability and performance.
item1.p3: Designed, architected, and implemented complex business-critical systems and user interfaces, ensuring high functionality and UX standards.
item1.p4: Active contributor to <1>{{methodology}}</1> ceremonies, improving team practices and leading knowledge transfer sessions.
item1.p5: Conducted research initiatives, introduced new <1>{{tools}}</1> and elevated company-wide coding standards.
item1.p6: Delivered diagnostic queries, data fixes, and support for high-profile clients including <2>{{clients}}</2>, ensuring data integrity and confidentiality.

item2.title: Front-End Developer
item2.p1: Completed a full-scale e-learning platform project, gaining hands-on experience in <1>{{tech}}</1>. Developed <1>{{ui}}</1>, managed state with React hooks, and ensured <1>{{responsive}}</1> across devices.

item3.title: Freelance Developer
item3.p1: Led the end-to-end design and delivery of a scalable AI-driven conversational agent, automating complex workflows and elevating user engagement across multiple platforms.
item3.p2: Architected and developed a robust administrative dashboard for a mid-size enterprise, enabling real-time tracking of records, payments, and deliveries—boosting operational efficiency and data visibility.
